meanings.definition: Tissue or organ transplanted from one part of the body to another in the same individual.
meanings.sent1: The doctor used autografts to repair the damaged knee.
meanings.sent2: Autografts are often used in skin graft surgeries.
meanings.sent3: The autografts in my body decided to switch places for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt like a garden of autografts, each part thriving in its new home.
meanings.sent5: The autografts were like tiny superheroes, saving the day inside my body.

meanings.definition: To transplant tissue or organ from one part of the body to another in the same individual.
meanings.sent1: The surgeon will autografts skin from my thigh to cover the burn.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often autografts bone to aid in healing fractures.
meanings.sent3: I will autografts my hair from one side to the other for a new look.
meanings.sent4: Her words autografts comfort from her heart to mine.
meanings.sent5: The gardener autografts flowers from one pot to another, ensuring their growth.
